dashboard.title: Event operations mission control
dashboard.subtitle: Keep approvals, staffing, and marketing signals aligned in one workspace so you can steer live experiences without leaving the dashboard.

status_messages.refreshing_data_description: Pulling the latest submissions, staffing counts, and campaign stats.

empty_states.all_triaged: Every submission has been triaged â€” enjoy a moment to breathe.

sections.events_awaiting_description: Review organizer details, skim logistics, and approve or send back revisions.

approval_dialog.approve_description: Move this event to the operations pipeline for staffing and marketing.
approval_dialog.reject_description: Return this event to the organizer with feedback.
approval_dialog.success_approved: Event approved and moved to the operations pipeline
approval_dialog.error_occurred: An error occurred while updating the event

event_detail.error_fetching: Something went wrong while fetching the event.
event_detail.review_tasks: Review and annotate operations tasks by workstream.

event_detail.update_placeholder: Capture updates, blockers, or context for teammates.
event_detail.final_approval_description: Verify organizer paperwork, then move the event live for marketing.
